message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1800000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

I understand your perspective on the market value, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer of $1600000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and benefits.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to go up to $1500000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that price?
